original_title: Vino Santo – Es lebe die Liebe, es lebe der Wein
overview: Half-Italian Gioia loves Max, but leaves her son's son to cheat her as a fiancé. When Mama invites the family to the Italian winery for Grandpa's 80th birthday, the feelings are on the table alongside pasta, pesto and vino, because Gioia happens to meet Max again ...
title: Vino Santo – Es lebe die Liebe, es lebe der Wein
